title: Top 10 Cornerbacks and Safeties: Minkah Fitzpatrick or Derwin James? Tre'Davious White or Jalen Ramsey? (Football 7/8)
description:
Who better than to rank defensive backs than someone who played the position at the highest level? Former pro cornerback and friend of the podcast, Bryant McFadden, joins Will Brinson to break down his Top 10 cornerback and safety lists. The guys start at CB (4:30) and discuss tough snubs, a potential breakout in Philly for Darius Slay, and Marcus Peters and Marlon Humphrey teaming up in the Ravens secondary. BMac and and Brinson also answer who they'd rather have: Tre'Davious White or Jalen Ramsey? Then, they transition to safety (30:00), examining some super solid players before hitting the consensus top 4 of Jamal Adams, Tyrann Mathieu, Derwin James and Minkah Fitzpatrick. What order do they fall in? I'm definitely not dumb enough to list it properly here, so you'll have to listen to find out.
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @willbrinson, @BMac_SportsTalk
